thread.title: Pound stumbles as UK manufacturing lurches towards stagnation
thread.title_full: Pound stumbles as UK manufacturing lurches towards stagnation

author: Szu Ping Chan
title: Pound stumbles as UK manufacturing lurches towards stagnation
text: Economics Pound stumbles as UK manufacturing lurches towards stagnation The sector is stuck in a 'holding pattern' as job losses are reported for the first time in 26 months Markit said the UK domestic market remained the "main pillar of new order growth", as the level of new export business decreased for the fifth straight month Photo: AP
